mapper.select:
select c.*,co.company,f.fleetName,ct.modelName,d.driverName,c.id as plateNoId from t_archives_car c LEFT JOIN t_archives_company co ON c.companyId = co.id LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON c.fleetId = f.id LEFT JOIN t_archives_car_type ct ON c.carType = ct.id LEFT JOIN t_archives_driver d ON c.driverId = d.id where 1=1
and c.fleetId = #{fleetId}
and c.plateNo like '%${plateNo}%'
and c.driverId like '%${driverId}%'

SELECT dp.*,f.fleetName,c.plateNo,c.modelName,d.driverName,d.driverId FROM t_archives_dispatcher_plateno dp LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON dp.fleetId = f.id INNER JOIN (SELECT c.*,t.modelName FROM t_archives_car c LEFT JOIN t_archives_car_type t ON c.carType = t.id WHERE carType = #{carTypeId}) c ON dp.plateNoId = c.id INNER JOIN (SELECT c.*,d.driverName FROM t_archives_car c LEFT JOIN t_archives_driver d ON c.driverId = d.id WHERE carType =#{carTypeId}) d ON dp.plateNoId = d.id WHERE 1=1 and dp.userId = #{userId}
and dp.fleetId = #{fleetId}

SELECT c.*,f.fleetName,ct.modelName,c.id as plateNoId,d.driverName FROM t_archives_car c LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON c.fleetId = f.id LEFT JOIN t_archives_car_type ct ON c.carType = ct.id LEFT JOIN t_archives_driver d ON c.driverId = d.id
and c.fleetId = #{fleetId}

select id,vehicleManager,driver,tel,plateNumber,truckModel,DWT, truckCargoType,CONVERT(varchar(100), buyingTime, 20) as buyingTime, truckType,gradeID,dispatchers,vehicleCondition from t_archives_car where 1=1
and dispatchers = '${dispatchers}'
order by dispatchers desc

select count(*) from t_archives_car where id!=#{id} and plateNo=#{plateNo}
and id !=#{id}
